snippet: Los Angeles Clippers point guard Chris Paul is, in the estimation of many, the best point guard in the N.B.A., but, at heart, he is still looking for a seat at the grown-ups’ table.
abstract: Los Angeles Clippers star Chris Paul, arguably the best point guard in the NBA, puts in strong performance during team's victory over Oklahoma City Thunder in first game of playoff series; while Paul has shown signs of maturing in recent years, his defiant spirit and high energy were on display during game.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Clippers point guard Chris Paul is, in the estimation of many, the best point guard in the N.B.A., but, at heart, he is still looking for a seat at the grown-ups’ table.

headline.main: Even With Maturity, Paul’s Inner Defiance Flourishes
headline.print_headline: Even With Maturity, Paul’s Inner Defiance Flourishes
